dialogue.introduction: Ex-merchant ship aircraft carrier, Junyo~! Woohoo!
dialogue.library_intro: Wartime remodeling based on the Luxury liner, Kashiwara Maru. The renovated appearance is the aircraft carrier, Jun'you. I fought properly, and survived until the end. Ain't I surprisingly capable ?
dialogue.secretary1: Ah~! Admiral, good work♪ Eh? No...I haven't been drinking~. I'm totally sober~.
dialogue.secretary2: Aaaadmiral~. If you're free, come help out~. Hiyou an' me, we need some planes built, ya know?
dialogue.secretary3: Wait a sec! I can hear a ba~d sound... it's not a enemy spy plane, is it?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Ahh man, I'm bored. Oh well, I'll drink! Let's see... maybe I'll have hot sake...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Yo~ Admiral, shouldn't we have a drink together some time? I got some really good sake. Ah, don't worry I have snacks too.
dialogue.wedding: I'm worked hard so that I wouldn't lose to those aircraft carriers. You're the only Admiral that gets that, you know. Hey, gimme a kiss~.
dialogue.show_players_score: That's right. Once in awhile, information management doesn't sound bad. How was it, hmmm?
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Let's do this! Jun'you's heading out!
dialogue.equipment2: S-so cool! I'm gonna fall in love with myself~!
dialogue.equipment3: Ready to go, ready to go!
dialogue.expedition_selection: Ready to go, ready to go!
dialogue.resource_collection: Ready to go, ready to go!
dialogue.instant_repair: Ready to go, ready to go!
dialogue.development: Ready to go, ready to go!
dialogue.supply: Much obliged. And don't forget to supply the canteen either. It's important!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: It's nothin' major. Just in case, yeah?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Dang, my armour's gettin' a bit thin. With me and Hiyou, there's no helping it.
dialogue.docking_complete: Repairs are finally over!. Let's celebrate my recovery!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new friend has come. Let's have a party.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet's come back. Good work.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: With me an' Hiyou here, well, we're a Task force, yeah? Yeah!
dialogue.battle_start: Let's go all out! All out!
dialogue.air_battle: Yeah, thas' it. I want Tenzans and Ryuuseis~
dialogue.attack: Heheh. I'm gonna strike with all my force! Eat this!
dialogue.mvp: Wha? Man, I really did it, didn't I? Carrier-based planes really are the best. Hehe.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Told ya' my armour was thin. Really!
dialogue.sunk: H-hey, hey now, I'm sinking? Really?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Ooh, today's an special day! Good, let's open some sake and Woohoo!
